  • Method Details

    • getElements

      public List<org.openqa.selenium.WebElement> getElements(org.openqa.selenium.By locator)

    • getElement

      public org.openqa.selenium.WebElement getElement(org.openqa.selenium.By locator)
      Retrieves a WebElement using the specified By locator.

      This method attempts to find the element on the current page using the provided locator. If the element is found, it is returned; otherwise, null is returned and an error message is printed.

      Parameters:
      locator - the By locator used to find the element
      Returns:
      the WebElement found, or null if not found or an exception occurs

    • doSendKeys

      public void doSendKeys(org.openqa.selenium.By locator, String value)
      Sends the specified text value to the web element located by the given locator. Waits for the element to be present before sending the keys.
      Parameters:
      locator - the By locator used to find the web element
      value - the text value to send to the web element

    • doClick

      public void doClick(org.openqa.selenium.By locator)
      Clicks on the web element located by the given locator. Waits for the element to be present before clicking.
      Parameters:
      locator - the By locator used to find the web element

    • doGetText

      public String doGetText(org.openqa.selenium.By locator)
      Retrieves the visible text from the web element located by the specified locator. Waits for the element to be present before attempting to get its text.
      Parameters:
      locator - the By locator used to find the web element
      Returns:
      the visible text of the located web element

    • doIsDisplayed

      public boolean doIsDisplayed(org.openqa.selenium.By locator)
      Checks if the web element identified by the given locator is displayed on the page. Waits for the element to be present for up to 10 seconds before checking its visibility.
      Parameters:
      locator - the By locator used to find the element
      Returns:
      true if the element is displayed; false otherwise

    • doSelectByVisibleText

      public void doSelectByVisibleText(org.openqa.selenium.By locator, String value)
      Selects an option from a dropdown element located by the specified locator, using the visible text of the option.
      Parameters:
      locator - the By locator to find the dropdown element
      value - the visible text of the option to be selected

    • doSelectByIndex

      public void doSelectByIndex(org.openqa.selenium.By locator, int index)
      Selects an option from a dropdown element located by the specified locator using the given index.
      Parameters:
      locator - the By locator used to find the dropdown element
      index - the index of the option to select (0-based)

    • doSelectByValue

      public void doSelectByValue(org.openqa.selenium.By locator, String value)
      Selects an option from a dropdown element located by the specified locator, using the given value attribute.
      Parameters:
      locator - the By locator to identify the dropdown element
      value - the value attribute of the option to be selected

    • doDropDownOptionsCount

      public int doDropDownOptionsCount(org.openqa.selenium.By locator)
      Returns the number of options available in a dropdown element located by the specified locator.
      Parameters:
      locator - the By locator used to find the dropdown element
      Returns:
      the count of options present in the dropdown

    • doGetDropDownOptions

      public ArrayList<String> doGetDropDownOptions(org.openqa.selenium.By locator)
      Retrieves all option texts from a dropdown element specified by the given locator.
      Parameters:
      locator - The By locator used to find the dropdown WebElement.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing the text of each option in the dropdown.

    • doSelectDropDownValue

      public void doSelectDropDownValue(org.openqa.selenium.By locator, String value)
      Selects a value from a dropdown element identified by the given locator. Iterates through all available options in the dropdown and clicks the option that matches the specified value.
      Parameters:
      locator - the By locator used to find the dropdown WebElement
      value - the visible text of the option to be selected

    • doSelectDropDownValueWithoutSelect

      public void doSelectDropDownValueWithoutSelect(org.openqa.selenium.By locator, String value)
      Selects a dropdown option by its visible text without using the Select class.

      This method retrieves all elements matching the given locator, iterates through them, and clicks the first element whose visible text matches the specified value.

      Parameters:
      locator - The By locator used to find the dropdown options.
      value - The visible text of the option to select.

    • selectChoiceValues

      public void selectChoiceValues(org.openqa.selenium.By locator, String... value)
      Selects choices from a list of web elements based on the provided values.

      If the first value in the value array is "ALL" (case-insensitive), all choices are selected. Otherwise, only the choices matching the provided values are selected.

      Parameters:
      locator - the By locator used to find the choice elements
      value - one or more values to select; if the first value is "ALL", all choices are selected

    • doDragAndDrop

      public void doDragAndDrop(org.openqa.selenium.By source, org.openqa.selenium.By target)
      Performs a drag-and-drop operation from the specified source element to the target element.
      Parameters:
      source - the locator for the source element to be dragged
      target - the locator for the target element where the source will be dropped

    • doActionsSendKeys

      public void doActionsSendKeys(org.openqa.selenium.By locator, String value)
      Sends the specified keys to the web element located by the given locator using Actions class.
      Parameters:
      locator - the By locator to identify the target web element
      value - the string value to send as keystrokes to the element

    • doActionsClick

      public void doActionsClick(org.openqa.selenium.By locator)
      Performs a click action on the web element located by the specified locator using Selenium Actions. Waits for the element to be present before clicking.
      Parameters:
      locator - the By locator of the web element to be clicked

    • visibilityofAllElements

      public List<org.openqa.selenium.WebElement> visibilityofAllElements(org.openqa.selenium.By locator, long timeoutInSeconds)
      Waits for all elements located by the specified locator to become visible within the given timeout.
      Parameters:
      locator - the By locator used to find the elements
      Returns:
      a list of WebElement objects that are visible

    • waitForElementPresent

      public org.openqa.selenium.WebElement waitForElementPresent(org.openqa.selenium.By locator, int timeout)
      Waits for the presence of a web element located by the specified locator within the given timeout.
      Parameters:
      locator - the By locator used to find the element
      timeout - the maximum time to wait in seconds
      Returns:
      the WebElement once it is present in the DOM
      Throws:
      org.openqa.selenium.TimeoutException - if the element is not found within the timeout

    • waitForElementToBeVisible

      public org.openqa.selenium.WebElement waitForElementToBeVisible(org.openqa.selenium.By locator, int timeout)
      Waits for the specified web element, located by the given locator, to become visible within the provided timeout.
      Parameters:
      locator - the By locator used to find the web element
      timeout - the maximum time to wait in seconds for the element to become visible
      Returns:
      the WebElement once it is visible
      Throws:
      org.openqa.selenium.TimeoutException - if the element does not become visible within the timeout

    • waitForElementToBeClickable

      public org.openqa.selenium.WebElement waitForElementToBeClickable(org.openqa.selenium.By locator, long timeout)
      Waits for the specified web element, located by the given By locator, to become clickable within the provided timeout.
      Parameters:
      locator - the By locator used to find the web element
      timeout - the maximum time to wait in seconds for the element to be clickable
      Returns:
      the WebElement once it is clickable

    • waitForElementToBeClickable

      public org.openqa.selenium.WebElement waitForElementToBeClickable(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element, long timeout)

    • waitForUrl

      public boolean waitForUrl(String url, int timeout)
      Waits until the current page URL contains the specified substring within the given timeout.
      Parameters:
      url - the substring to be checked in the current URL
      timeout - the maximum time to wait in seconds
      Returns:
      true if the URL contains the specified substring within the timeout, false otherwise

    • waitForAlertToBePresent

      public org.openqa.selenium.Alert waitForAlertToBePresent(int timeout)
      Waits for an alert to be present within the specified timeout.
      Parameters:
      timeout - the maximum time to wait in seconds for the alert to appear
      Returns:
      the Alert object if present within the timeout

    • clickWhenReady

      public void clickWhenReady(org.openqa.selenium.By locator, int timeout)
      Waits until the specified web element is clickable within the given timeout and then clicks it.
      Parameters:
      locator - the By locator of the web element to be clicked
      timeout - the maximum time to wait in seconds for the element to become clickable

    • waitForTitleToBePresent

      public String waitForTitleToBePresent(String title, int timeout)
      Waits until the page title contains the specified text within the given timeout period.
      Parameters:
      title - The text that should be present in the page title.
      timeout - The maximum time to wait in seconds for the title to contain the specified text.
      Returns:
      The current page title after the condition is met.

    • scrollToElement

      public void scrollToElement(org.openqa.selenium.By locator)
      Scrolls the web page until the specified element is in view.
      Parameters:
      locator - The By locator used to find the element to scroll to.

    • jsClick

      public void jsClick(org.openqa.selenium.By locator)
      Clicks on a web element using JavaScript. This method is useful for clicking elements that may not be interactable using standard WebDriver click, such as elements hidden by overlays or not visible in the viewport.
      Parameters:
      locator - The By locator of the web element to be clicked.

      Reads a JSON file from the specified file path and parses its contents into a JsonObject.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the JSON file to be read
      Returns:
      the parsed JsonObject representing the contents of the file
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while reading the file or parsing the JSON

      value - the text value to send to the input field

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • waitForElementToDisappear

      Parameters:
      spinner - the By locator of the element to wait for disappearance
      timeout - the maximum time to wait in seconds
      Returns:
      true if the element becomes invisible within the timeout, false otherwise

    • getCssValue

      public String getCssValue(org.openqa.selenium.By locator, String propertyName)
      Retrieves the value of a specified CSS property for the web element located by the given locator.
      Parameters:
      locator - the By locator used to find the web element
      propertyName - the name of the CSS property whose value is to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the value of the specified CSS property for the located element

    • switchToFrame

      public void switchToFrame(org.openqa.selenium.By locator)
      Switches the WebDriver context to the specified frame located by the given locator.
      Parameters:
      locator - the By locator used to find the frame element

    • switchToDefaultContent

      public void switchToDefaultContent()
      Switches the driver's context to the default content of the current page. This method is useful when you have switched into one or more frames and need to return to the main document.

    • acceptAlert

      public void acceptAlert(int timeout)
      Waits for an alert to be present within the specified timeout and accepts it.
      Parameters:
      timeout - the maximum time to wait in seconds for the alert to appear

    • dismissAlert

      public void dismissAlert(int timeout)
      Waits for an alert to be present within the specified timeout and dismisses it.
      Parameters:
      timeout - the maximum time to wait in seconds for the alert to appear

    • getAlertText

      public String getAlertText(int timeout)
      Waits for an alert to be present within the specified timeout and returns its text.
      Parameters:
      timeout - the maximum time to wait in seconds for the alert to appear
      Returns:
      the text displayed in the alert

    • scrollByPixel

      public void scrollByPixel(int x, int y)
      Scrolls the window by the specified number of pixels along the X and Y axes.
      Parameters:
      x - the number of pixels to scroll horizontally.
      y - the number of pixels to scroll vertically.

    • scrollToBottom

      public void scrollToBottom()
      Scrolls the web page to the bottom using JavaScript execution. This method utilizes the JavascriptExecutor to perform the scroll action. Useful for loading dynamic content or interacting with elements at the bottom of the page.

    • refreshPage

      public void refreshPage()
      Refreshes the current page in the browser. This method uses the WebDriver's navigate functionality to reload the active page.

    • navigateTo

      public void navigateTo(String url)
      Navigates the web driver to the specified URL.
      Parameters:
      url - the URL to navigate to

    • waitForExactTitle

      public boolean waitForExactTitle(String expectedTitle, int timeout)
      Waits until the page title matches the specified expected title within the given timeout.
      Parameters:
      expectedTitle - the exact title to wait for
      timeout - the maximum time to wait in seconds
      Returns:
      true if the title matches within the timeout, false otherwise

    • captureScreenshot

      public void captureScreenshot(String filePath)
      Captures a screenshot of the current browser window and saves it to the specified file path.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the destination file path where the screenshot will be saved
